explanation: [0-0] A blue cartoon truck is on a yellow road. The background is a blue sky with white clouds, surrounded by green plants and trees, and a yellow gas dispenser next to it.
[0-3] Subsequently, the truck drives along the yellow road and stops in front of a gas station, which has two gray pillars and a yellow roof.
[0-3] Subsequently, the truck drives along the yellow road and stops in front of a gas station, which has two gray pillars and a yellow roof.

[3-7] Next, the screen switches to a close-up of the gas dispenser. There's a color dial on the dispenser with blue, orange, and red colors. The dial starts to rotate, and the colors change continuously. The color dial stops rotating, and all three colors turn red.

[3-7] Next, the screen switches to a close-up of the gas dispenser. There's a color dial on the dispenser with blue, orange, and red colors. The dial starts to rotate, and the colors change continuously. The color dial stops rotating, and all three colors turn red.

[7-15] Afterward, the screen returns to the truck. A fuel hose connects the truck and the dispenser. Bumps appear continuously on the hose, and the truck shakes up and down. Subsequently, the truck flashes bright white stars, appearing happy. Then, the truck jumps, with many black lines appearing on the top of its front face, and its expression turns sad.

[15-18] Next, the screen switches to the rear of the truck. The truck starts to shake, a puff of red exhaust comes out from behind, and the truck quickly leaves the screen. Only the dispenser and the gas station building are left on the screen, with the fuel hose carelessly thrown on the ground.
